document.docTitle: Munida shaula Macpherson & de Saint Laurent 2002
document.masterDocTitle: New sibling species and new occurrences of squat lobsters (Crustacea, Decapoda) from the western Indian Ocean

bibRefCitation.refString: Macpherson E. & Saint Laurent M. de 2002. On the genus Munida Leach, 1820 (Decapoda, Galatheidae) from the western and southern Indian Ocean, with the description of four new species. Crustaceana 75: 465 - 484. https: // doi. org / 10.1163 / 156854002760095525

figureCitation.captionText: Fig. 13. Dorsal view. Colours in life. A. Munida nesiotes Macpherson, 1999, ov. ♀, 8.5 mm, Mozambique, MAINBAZA, Stn CP3143. B. Munida shaula Macpherson & de Saint Laurent, 2002, ov. ♀, 12.4 mm, Mozambique, MAINBAZA, Stn CC3151. C. Munida tetracantha sp. nov., paratype, ♂, 7.4 mm, Mozambique, MAINBAZA, Stn CP3131. D. Paramunida marionis Cabezas et al., 2011, ♀, 6.0 mm, Mozambique, MAINBAZA, Stn CP3143.

subSubSection.paragraph: Ground colour of carapace and abdomen orange to orange red; rostrum and supraocular spines orangereddish; abdominal somites 5–6 whitish with orange ridges; telson whitish. P1 pink-whitish, with red bands on distal part of carpus, palm and fingers; numerous dorsal spines reddish. P2–4 whitish with red bands.
